attributes.action: S.G.H. DUCK  MR AND MRS S.J.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All ENGLISH MPs to be of ENGLISH descent for a minium of 250 years on the male side.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
